org.virtualwar.robot

Class Robot

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.virtualwar.robot.Robot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Mover
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Scavenger, Shooter, Tank

    public abstract class Robot
extends java.lang.Object
implements Mover
    The abstract class of robots.
    Author:
    amberstar

        team - team of robot
        coordinates - coordinate of robot in board
        board - the board to work with
        regenBase - the amount of energy given when in base
        maxEng - the maximal amount of energy the robot can have
